tns:patch.author: eperez
tns:patch.description: Global settings availability for Saiku configuration

script.lang: INSERT INTO amp_global_settings(id, settingsName, settingsValue, possibleValues, description, section) VALUES (nextval('amp_global_settings_seq'), 'Use only Saiku for donor reports', 'false', 't_Boolean', 'Defines if donor reports are opened only using Saiku', 'general');
